availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Collin Shelton Throckmorton (Daviess County, Kentucky, midshipman and farmer)

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, midshipman and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Malvina L. Ward Throckmorton on May 5, 1846. Father of Emily Throckmorton, Aris Throckmorton, and Matt Throckmorton. Served in the U.S. Navy as a midshipman from December 8, 1837, to 1843. Farmer in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned fifteen enslaved persons in Daviess County in 1860.
